title: Work From Heart
overview: Dee is a spoiled rich boy. His parents passed away when he was a little kid. So Dee is the one whose grandma and grandfather expect to be the next one who runs the family business. And It's time for Dee to do an internship to graduate the university. But his grandfather thinks that Dee can't do anything on his own so his grandpa secretly plans to take over DIFA company where there is an agency that Dee is heading for. Dee has to work with Knight a heartless Senior Marketing employee and the problem is Dee's face accidentally looks alike his bride who's broken his heart.
